白樫: (シラカシ) - quercus myrsinifolia; bamboo Leaved Oak; quercus myrsinaefolia

白沙: (しらす) - bar of white sand; gravel separating a noh stage from the audience; court of law(in the Edo period)
白沢: (はくたく) - bai ze (mythical chinese animal able to understand human speech, having the body of a lion and eight eyes)
白河夜船: (しらかわよぶね) - (yoji) being fast asleep (and totally unaware of what is going on around one); know-it-all manner

白浪物: (しらなみもの) - tale featuring robbers; kabuki play featuring robbers
白海老: (シロエビ) - broad velvet shrimp (Metapenaeopsis lata); shiba shrimp (Metapenaeus joyneri)

白滝: (しらたき) - noodles made from konnyaku; sheet-like waterfall

白濠主義: (はくごうしゅぎ) - White Australia Policy (pre-1965 Australian immigration policy)

白犬薺: (シロイヌナズナ) - thale cress (Arabidopsis thaliana)

白田売買: (しろたばいばい) - (yoji) dealing in rice speculating on the year's harvest while the paddies are still covered with snow

白癬: (しらくぼ) - {med} ringworm (of the scalp); tinea capitis
白癬菌: (はくせんきん) - Trichophyton fungus (dermatophyte that causes ringworm, etc.)
白白: (しらじら) - growing light (e.g. at dawn); pale; appearing dumb/talking in an obvious way
白白しい: (しらじらしい) - barefaced (e.g. lie)/shameless/transparent; pure white/very clear
白目を剥く: (しろめをむく) - to open one's eyes wide (as in fear or anger); to faint

白眼: (はくがん) - whites of the eyes; cold, unwelcoming eyes

白粥: (しらかゆ) - unflavored rice porridge; rice porridge made of only white rice and water
白紙: (しらかみ) - white paper/flyleaf; blank paper; clean slate/lack of prior opinion, positions, etc.; scratch/beginning

白紙に返す: (はくしにかえす) - to wipe the slate clean; to start anew
